title: Virtual Appointment Guide
content:
# Preparing for Your Virtual Appointment

## Technical Requirements
- A device with a camera and microphone (smartphone, tablet, or computer)
- Stable internet connection
- Our secure meeting application (download link provided in confirmation email)

## Before Your Appointment
1. Test your device and internet connection
2. Find a quiet, private space
3. Have any relevant documents ready
4. Log in 5 minutes early to test your connection

## During Your Appointment
- Ensure good lighting so the consultant can see you clearly
- Speak clearly and at a normal volume
- If disconnected, try rejoining or wait for our call
